itinerary.event_name: Outdoor Exploration near South Lake Union

activities.activity_name: Meet and Greet at Denny Park
activities.description: Begin the adventure at Denny Park for introductions and group orientation
Enjoy a scenic bike ride to Gas Works Park. Explore its unique features, including the remnants of an old gasification plant and stunning views of the city skyline.
Embark on a hiking adventure in Discovery Park, one of Seattle's largest city parks. Discover beautiful nature trails, viewpoints, and the historic lighthouse.
Participate in the Sponsored Activity at the Sponsored Location.
Enjoy a picnic lunch with breathtaking views of the city at Kerry Park.
Explore the outdoor sculpture museum of Olympic Sculpture Park. Admire contemporary artwork and enjoy the waterfront location.

activities.activity_name: Bike back to South Lake Union
activities.description: Conclude the event with a relaxing bike ride back to South Lake Union.
